backend/main.mo: Defines core types for salons, bookings, users, and images, initializes authorization and storage mixins, and includes logic for seeding default Swiss salons.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required frontend behaviors, file targets, and associated components for validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short textual summaries of numerous frontend files for documentation and build reference.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes with color tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple wrapper that renders and exports the AppV1 component.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React file implementing categories, salon data, and the Mirror Protocol flow with recording, review, and success steps.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the AuthHeader component.
Empty placeholder file for the CreateSalonForm component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the MemberCard component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty placeholder file for the MonopolyModeSwitch component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the MotionButton component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the PremiumBadge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Pressable component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for the ProfileSetupModal component.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty placeholder file for the ProSalonWizard component.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder file for the ProStudioCreator component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the RevenueChart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder file for the SalonListSection component.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the VipDashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, light/dark theme color variables, and custom animation keyframes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates styled marketing text for a salon based on category, tags, type, and city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s versioned state and architecture notes, including a full frontend/backend reset and new V65 app specifications.
